Time & Location

G1 is Research Lab named as Chevalier Lab Studio. Chevalier Lab is performed on Study Group, Research, Development. In our development team we have game development, mobile development, and web development. This lab is open for eveyone in Applied Science Faculty not even D3 Software Engineering Appliacation Students.

G5 is a classroom located on the first floor of the faculty of applied sciences. This classroom is not a room for practicum, but only for material class, because there is no computer available here. Existing facilities to support learning there are blackboards, air conditioners and projectors.

G6 is a classroom located on the first floor of the faculty of applied sciences. This classroom is not a room for practicum, but only for material class, because there is no computer available here. Existing facilities to support learning there are blackboards, air conditioners and projectors.

G7 is a classroom located on the first floor of the faculty of applied sciences. This classroom is not a room for practicum, but only for material class, because there is no computer available here. Existing facilities to support learning there are blackboards, air conditioners and projectors.

G9 is a classroom located on the first floor of the faculty of applied sciences. This classroom is not a room for practicum, but only for material class, because there is no computer available here. Existing facilities to support learning there are blackboards, air conditioners and projectors.
Kitchen is a special class room majoring in hospitality. This room is very large and consists of two parts, one for practice dining with manner and another practice for making and serving food.

MP Mart is is a minimarket owned by the faculty of applied sciences and managed by the marketing management department for business practice activities. MP Mart is very helpful to the FIT community because if they want to buy light snacks, they just need to buy it there, no need to leave the building.

Canteen is an area for eating and drinking in the community of applied sciences. There is a long table and lots of long chairs. Food and beverage sellers are also numerous and their dishes are also varied. Not only a place for lunch breaks, but the canteen is also commonly used to gather and work on group assignments by students.

Laboran is a room that manages all practicum activities in the faculty of applied sciences. Registration for practicum assistants or laboratory assistants, receiving their salaries, borrowing practicum rooms, lending tools and various matters relating to practicum are managed here. The research lab is also managed by staff in this room.
This event is colaborate with D3 Software Engineering Application and Dicoding on this event participans will create android app mentored by professional andoroid developer from Dicoding Indonesia.

This event is an opening ceremony for the new MP Mart with a better store design. To celebrate this event, MP Mart gave a large discount in purchasing various products. The purpose of course is not only as a ceremonial event, but also to introduce MP Mart to Telkom University.

This event is an exhibition of the final project of the work of final year students majoring in D3 in application software engineering. Here they introduce their work, as well as to find user feedback and ratings from lecturers. Level one and two students are highly encouraged to come to this exhibition, because they can learn a lot about the results that can be made by their seniors.

This event was made by students majoring in hospitality. They are challenged by lecturers to make and distribute cakes for free, which for those who have tasted artificial cakes they have to give an honest assessment.
